resources.string: This app will set an static ARP entry on the gateway MAC address each time you connect to a wifi network, to protect your phone from arp spoofing techniques used in MiTM attacks. This app needs root access to add the static arp entry.
You don\'t have Root Access! You need to be rooted in order to use this app!
Could not set static ARP on the gateway mac
Could not set static ARP on the gateway mac, no root access given.
An error was encountered while attempting to run as root. Arpspoof requires root.
Copy executable for use with terminal.
\nEnter the IP address of the host you wish to impersonate and press "Begin Spoofing". If you do not enter an IP address then Arpspoof will attempt to spoof the network\'s gateway.
not \'(src host localhost or dst host localhost or arp)\'
Enter the IP address you want to spoof here
This app is made to help you protect from ARP attacks and also start ones!
This app made by Nikolaos Bousios A.K.A. Rambou and made as a university project.
